description: It didn’t take long to get Grayson to come back and show us that even the calm ones have wild sides. He was extra excited to be paired up with Sean to explore that side of him. “I’m a big fan of Sean, I hear he’s got a big dick.” Sean proudly responded, “Yes, I do!” Grayson was curious, “Can I see it?” He definitely liked what he saw, then Sean pulled his shorts back up and Grayson was left wondering about the other side. “Are you an ass guy, Grayson?” He had a look of anticipation in his eyes, “Yeah!” He certainly showed us he’s an ass guy. He used Sean’s hole so good and blew a warm load right inside of him!
title: Grayson & Sean: Bareback
